messages.subject: RE:  Radical Unschooling Analogy
messages.msgSnippet: I just want to clarify that I did not mean to imply that people who aren t familiar with natural parenting or radical unschooling do not have principles. I m
messages.messageBody:
I just want to clarify that I did not mean to imply that people who
aren't familiar with natural parenting or radical unschooling do not
have principles. I'm just trying to understand things through the eyes
of those who have those philosphies that are unfamiliar to me.

I hope that my questions were not offensive and that you can see I'm
just sincerely seeking something that I would love to one day
implement in my home.

Thanks
Sandy
